Blog.post: hey ppl. im bored and yall dont like to put post on here so ill tell u about my great canadian friend. even tho canada is the bitch of the world, she is cool. canada is the bitch of the world, but iraq is a big bitch of the world. just to get that off my mind. now, my canadian friend is depressed coz dick, (her COOL boyfriend), lives in a different province of canada, and because canada such a big bitch, she cant c him coz, her countries a big bitch and she has to come home coz her mommy misses her. i will refer to amy's mother as mum, since that is what amy calls her. well, amy is always cool in my book, even tho her country is a bitch. i dont know why, but i just think canada is full of those french bastards out to get the united states. amy doesnt deserve to live in such bitchy country so maybe my loyal blog fans can create a "save the amy fund" to get her out of that damn bitch country, and hell, maybe cool ass friends too. :D i am not sorry for offending anyone who reads this coz they are most likely canadian bitches. thus, hahaha canadian bitches, i have just put down your country. HAHAHA!!! i love amy park, that is why i would really support the "save the amy fund". i will make a enormous contribution of 5$. american, coz candian $ is a rip off coz its too damn much. well i better go before the canadian like CIA type thing, kills me. my friend, (no name mentioned for her or his own protection), tells me the canadian bitches CIA type thing, is the RCMP and it sucks ass. peace out buddy.

have yall been watchin the democratic party shit thing on tv? man, that kerry guy really bugs me, he looks like a mob boss, and teresa or however u spell it looks like the hitman, holy shyte dude, she is like frickin insane!!!!!! she starts trippin and tellin ppl to shove it, then she tries to tell ppl how her husband is a nice saine person. LOL. dude, to be married to that, u would have to be crazy. lol. and why the hell would u wanna cut the war budgets?! to watch the guys on our side throw rocks at the taliban? dude, thats what will happen if he wins. well i gtg. post ur comments on the election or war in iraq or whatever the hell u want, for all i care, u can write about ur dinner last nite. cya

Hey ppl, wats up? i was wonderin y yall never leave post. it makes me think im not loved by my readers. :'( come on, if u love me, leave a post. i wanna see wat yall are up to coz my town really sucks big balls. it is soooo boring. just leave a post sayin hi at least. PPLLLLLLLZZZZZZZZZ!!!!!!?????? thank u.

Hi ppl. I would like to say thx for checkin out my blog and that i will look forward to seeing ur postings. i am editing it now to where any1 can write a post, even non-members, BUT I do insist u become a member coz then u can make ur own blog and its sooooo fun getting ur emails and hearing from u. well i gtg but thx for checkin me i mean my blog out ;) cya, malakei
Welcome to my new blog. This place was created just coz i wanted ppl to have fun. :D I hope you enjoy yourself and have fun!!!! :D
Hey ppl. i hope you will check this place out, i will try to publish new things kinda routinely but i would like anyone willing to join. i need all the help i can get. C'Ya
Hey, it's me Malakei. Hope you have fun with my new blog. Lol. blog is such an awesome word, wish i heard it before. lol. blog. ok. well gtg. peace out.
